header.description: No header tokens are present in this report

rows.description: Each row represents one device table entry with its attributes: name, associated device, schema, target database, operational status, mapping health indicator, and last migration timestamp

totals.description: No totals are computed for this report

semantics: This report has no filter parameters. All device tables are returned in their natural order.
transformations: No transformations required - direct column mapping from app_device_tables
